title: Keep Android Open
author: LorenDB
aiHeadline: Google's latest 'Keep Android Open' campaign is as believable as their 'Don't Be Evil' motto, which somehow still manages to make us all laugh in 2025.

title: Uv is the best thing to happen to the Python ecosystem in a decade
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: After a decade of Python tools that somehow manage to be both overcomplicated and underpowered, 'uv' finally arrives to save the day—probably by adding yet another layer of complexity we'll all hate in six months.

title: Tell HN: Azure outage
author: tartieret
aiHeadline: Azure outage? Oh, that's just Microsoft's way of reminding us that even their cloud services can't escape the inevitable tech chaos, much like how Windows updates always break something important.

title: AWS to bare metal two years later: Answering your questions about leaving AWS
author: ndhandala
aiHeadline: Two years later, a company finally leaves AWS and answers all our questions—except the one we really care about: 'Why did it take so long?'

title: Minecraft removing obfuscation in Java Edition
author: SteveHawk27
aiHeadline: Minecraft removes obfuscation in Java Edition, making it easier for everyone to see how their code works—except, of course, for the mods that will now have an even harder time keeping up with the changes.
